ideas.title: Google reportedly snags up team behind AI voice startup Hume AI
ideas.description: Google has hired the CEO and top top behind voice AI startup Hume AI, signaling that voice is increasingly becoming the preferred interface over screens.
hooks: Voice AI: The Silent Revolution Transforming Tech
Google's Secret Weapon: Hume AI's Voice Pioneers
When AI Learns to Truly Listen

tips: Use cinematic B-roll of tech environments and voice interaction scenes
Incorporate interview-style expert commentary with dynamic motion graphics
Create chapter markers highlighting key voice AI transition moments

visualDirection.description: High-contrast dark mode aesthetic with electric blue/teal accents. Dynamic split-screen compositions showing human-AI voice interactions. Minimalist futuristic typography with subtle motion tracking. Incorporate abstract data visualization representing voice wave patterns. Reference visual style of 'Ex Machina' and WIRED documentary aesthetics.

exampleOutline: Opening: Dramatic voice AI interaction montage

ideas.title: From invisibility cloaks to AI chips: Neurophos raises $110M to build tiny optical processors for inferencing
ideas.description: Neurophos is taking a crack at solving the AI industry's power efficiency problem with an optical chip that uses a composite material to do the math required in AI inferencing tasks.
hooks: Invisibility Cloaks Meet AI: The $110M Chip Revolution
How Tiny Optical Chips Will Transform AI Forever
Light-Speed AI: The Breakthrough Silicon Can't Match

tips: Use dynamic screen recordings showing chip architecture
Create clear chapter markers for complex technical content
Use visual metaphors to explain complex optical processing
Incorporate motion graphics to illustrate technical concepts

visualDirection.description: High-contrast teal and electric blue color palette, futuristic translucent graphics simulating optical pathways, clean sans-serif typography with technical precision, fluid motion transitions suggesting light/data movement, minimalist tech-documentary aesthetic blending scientific accuracy with creative visualization

ideas.title: Anthropic has to keep revising its technical interview test so you can’t cheat on it with Claude
ideas.description: Since 2024, Anthropic's performance optimization team has given job seekers a take-home test to make sure they know their stuff â€” but as AI coding tools have gotten better, the test has had to change a lot to stay ahead of AI-assisted cheating.
hooks: How Tech Interviews Outsmart AI Cheating
The Cat-and-Mouse Game of Technical Interviews
